item.title: Yuma Nest launches in Early Access on March 11
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Open-world 2D sandbox action RPG dated.

Open-world 2D sandbox action RPG Yuma Nest will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam on March 11, developer Piokou announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Destroy massive swarms of monsters and build automated systems that fight for you in Yuma Nest. An open-world sandbox action RPG where you grow stronger in the overworld before diving deep into an interconnected underworld.

Open-World Sandbox RPG

Fight swarms of monsters and build automated structures that battle alongside you. Complete quests, defeat bosses, and upgrade your gear as you grow stronger in the overworld—then take your builds into an interconnected, Metroidvania-style underworld.

Key Features

  • Train – Level up and customize your training rooms!
  • Build – Build structures that help you train, or set up a fully automated monster-killing system!
  • Hunt Elite Monsters – Hunt down Elite Monsters to obtain player Enhancements that synergize to adapt to different scenarios!
  • Join the Yumanite Association – Play as the Yoyo-Weilding Psychic class! Another class is planned.
  • Upgrade – Spend your loot to upgrade your equipment!
  • Metroidvania World – Use your preparations from the sandboxy overworld to explore deeper into a Metroidvania-style region, and defeat bosses to unlock the skills for your class!
  • A Personalized Adventure
    • Obtain a bike mount to get around the world quickly!
    • Obtain a pet that fights alongside you!
    • Customize your character with different hair and face styles! Collect random cosmetic equipment from the gacha machine!
    • Buy a home that helps you fast-travel around the open world!

Watch a new trailer below.

Early Access Release Date Trailer
